radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild intrahepatic bile duct dilatation. Gallbladder is mildly distended with cholelithiasis and gallbladder sludge. Mild circumferential gallbladder wall thickening and enhancement. Trace pericholecystic fluid. Extrahepatic biliary dilatation with CBD measuring up to 1.1 cm. No definite choledocholithiasis. No pericardial effusion, no pleural effusion, and minimal right basilar atelectasis.
